channel.title: nmap on Script Adults
channel.description: Recent content in nmap on Script Adults

item.title: Fuzzing nmap(1): a Dumb Approach
item.description: Introduction Recently I am hooked on fuzzing. Apart from “normal” fuzzing following the textbook examples, I tried to fuzz nmap because It is fun Seems no blog posts about fuzzing nmap yet, it surprised me, and hence, it is fun, again. üòè As my first target, I am going to fuzz the nse of nmap. NSE (nmap scripting engine) parses the scripts provided in --script and provide additional scanning according to how the script is written.
